live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates. A further update will be provided at 08:18 MT.
57695.summary: Some customers in the Lower Townsite area of Fort McMurray are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
57695.title: Feb 8 - Fort McMurray (Lower Townsite) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
